Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: An aureate prayer to the Virgin Mary — in macaronic 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Sonet vox tua in auribus’

BodAsh59.First Lines:
OR dilectus meus shewde dileccoundesired me vnder his
                    vmbracounI þe fader of þe doughters affeccounVirgyne Syon no
                    variacyoun…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…O filia Syon laudabilis nimisIam sonet vox tua in
                        auribus
BodAsh59.Attributed Author:
A glorious preyer / Til oure Ladye by Lidegate (f.
                    21v)
BodAsh59.Attributed Title:
A glorious preyer / Til oure Ladye by Lidegate (f.
                    21v)

BLHar2251.First Lines:
REx Salamon summus of sapienceThe whiche the sterrid cercle hath
                    set in substaunce…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Thus was I exalted fro stede RuynesExultet celum
                    laudibusO filia Syon luadabilis nimisSonet vox tua in
                    auribus
BLHar2251.Editions:
Edwards,  A. S. G.,  and  A. W. Jenkins.  
             “A Hymn to the Virgin: By Lydgate?” 
             Medieval Studies
         35 (1973): 60-6: 64-6.
